channel.title: Model resize
channel.description:
http://gyazo.com/9e33fd8c4973ec26cda3a635d0c09e38
I downloaded some torva,virtus,pernix models and ints I added them in and this is the result... the inventory look is messed up, and when u wear them they are oversized but on my friends client they work, anybody know where the code Is in the client that resizes the models automatically?
